DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Numerous observational epidemiologic study establish ethanol intake one important determinant blood pressure level . However , data intervention study limit . The study inter-agency agreement involve Veterans Administration National Institute Alcohol Abuse Alcoholism ( NIAAA ) . Protocol development occur October 1988 June 1989 . The protocol approve VA Cooperative Studies Evaluation Committee July 1989 review separate Data Safety Monitoring Board September 1989 . DESIGN NARRATIVE : Subjects randomize intervention control group . Intervention aim reduce alcohol intake 14 drink per week 50 percent less participant 's baseline level . The intervention technique consist cognitive-behavioral program , intensive phase consist six counseling session three month . Echocardiograms obtain baseline six month randomization . Biochemical marker use validate change alcohol consumption . The trial include eighteen-month feasibility phase six-month follow-up 36-month main trial two year follow-up . Recruitment full-scale trial end June 1993 . Final study visit conduct September October 1994 . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Query View Report System ( QVR ) .
DOC.criteria: Men woman diastolic blood pressure 80 89 mm Hg alcohol intake 21 drink per week .
